snippet: The Museum of the Moving Image in Queens looks at the history of shooter video games in “Spacewar!”
abstract: Chris Suellentrop reviews exhibit Spacewar! Video Games Blast Off, history of shooter video games, at Museum of the Moving Image in Queens.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of the Moving Image in Queens looks at the history of shooter video games in “Spacewar!”
